data.comment: Milan kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Throw-in Milan.
In the minute 1, Free kick Milan.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Milan to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Genoa.
Daniele Orsato awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Genoa's Eldor Shomurodov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Milan defender.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 9, Lukas Lerager (Genoa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Milan's Samu Castillejo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 9, Daniele Orsato awards Genoa a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 11, Milan's Alessio Romagnoli breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Genoa.
In the minute 13, Daniele Orsato signals a Milan throw-in in Genoa's half.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Daniele Orsato signals a throw-in for Milan, close to Genoa's area.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Milan.
Luca Pellegrini is booked for the home team.
In the minute 19, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Orsato signals a Genoa throw-in in Milan's half.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Milan are in shooting range from this free kick.
Milan drives forward and Hakan Calhanoglu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Genoa.
Can Milan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 25, Alessio Romagnoli (Milan) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Milan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 28, Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Milan.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Milan have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 34, Eldor Shomurodov for Genoa is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In Genoa Genoa attack through Mattia Destro. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ante Rebic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Milan.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Milan.
Alessio Romagnoli (Milan) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 39, Milan to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 43, Daniele Orsato awards the home team a throw-in.
Daniele Orsato signals a Genoa throw-in in Milan's half.
Goal kick for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 44, Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Genoa.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 45, Daniele Orsato awards the home team a throw-in.
Daniele Orsato blows to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Genoa - Genoa with the kick-off.
Daniele Orsato signals a throw-in for Milan, close to Genoa's area.
In the minute 46, Rolando Maran (Genoa) is making a first substitution, with Lennart Czyborra replacing Luca Pellegrini.
Goal! Genoa have got their heads in front thanks to a Mattia Destro strike.
In the minute 49, Mattia Bani is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Milan.
Mattia Bani has recovered and rejoins the match in Genoa.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Goal! Davide Calabria equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Hakan Calhanoglu.
In the minute 53, At Luigi Ferraris, Samu Castillejo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 54, Daniele Orsato awards Milan a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Samu Castillejo with Alexis Saelemaekers. This is the first substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
Milan make their second substitution with Jens Hauge replacing Ante Rebic.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Genoa in the half of Milan.
Goal! Genoa have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Mattia Destro.
Great play from Paolo Ghiglione to set up the goal.
In the minute 62, Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Genoa.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
In the minute 67, Genoa drive upfield and Edoardo Goldaniga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Milan defender.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Milan.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 69, Filippo Melegoni is replacing Marko Pjaca for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Genoa.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniele Orsato signals a Milan throw-in in Genoa's half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
Rolando Maran is making the team's third substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Gianluca Scamacca replacing Mattia Destro.
Valon Behrami is replacing Stefano Sturaro for the home team.
In the minute 77, Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Sandro Tonali with Brahim Diaz. This is the third substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
Jens Hauge (Milan) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Milan to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Genoa.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Hakan Calhanoglu (Milan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Milan have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Pierre Kalulu gets an equalizer for Milan. The score is now 2-2.
Alessio Romagnoli with an assist there.
In the minute 83, Rafael Leao (Milan) has received a yellow card from Daniele Orsato.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Genoa have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Ivan Radovanovic is replacing Eldor Shomurodov for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Free kick for Milan in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 87, Genoa's Ivan Radovanovic has been booked in Genoa.
Milan push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Hakan Calhanoglu gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Genoa defence.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 88, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Edoardo Goldaniga (Genoa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Daniele Orsato signals a free kick to Milan in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Genoa.
Lukas Lerager (Genoa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Daniele Orsato.
Milan are pushing forward but Davide Calabria's finish is wide of the goal.
Daniele Orsato awards Genoa a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
